item.title: Links That Help for Hugo
item.description: HUGO Quickstart a brief introduction into “HUGO” https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Configure HUGO https://gohugo.io/getting-started/configuration/ Hosting HUGO on Github https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ HUGO Themes https://themes.gohugo.io/ nice Airspace: https://themes.gohugo.io/airspace-hugo/ HUGO Showcase “FORESTRY” https://gohugo.io/showcase/forestry/ Netlify https://app.netlify.com Markdownn CheatSheet https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet#lists
